null.text: :mantelpiece_clock: Hold on while I talk to Google Drive...

error.text: :thinking_face: Hmm, I don't know that command... Try `%s help`

help.text: Use the `%s` command to access this channel's Google Drive folder

attachments.text:
`%s` will fetch the link to Google Drive

`%s help` will show this message

not_permitted.text: :crying_cat_face: Sorry, you aren't allowed to do this yet.
